name: Solar System Simulation (gcstudios)
description:
This is a simple Solar System simulation created for training purposes. 

The deliverables were created as requested in the Game Design and Development course by Mitchigan State University.

The game contains all solar system planets.

The audio is not fully working in WebGL due to a bug on Unity Engine (pls see: https://forum.unity.com/threads/audio-not-working-on-webgl-builds-in-any-browser... and others.) 

Created by GC Studios with Unity 3D 2021.3.15f1
